text: Charles Frederick "Charlie" Wilson (30 June 1932 â€“ 23 April 1990) was a British criminal. He was born in Battersea, London. He was a member of the Great Train Robbery gang. He was shot dead by a hitman on a bicycle in 1990 when he was living in Marbella, Spain. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Criminals from London Category:English murder victims Category:Great Train Robbers Category:Murders by firearm
title: Charlie Wilson (criminal)
